      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Constructors in application with parameters of type Point 
      Constructor and Description
      Block(Point loc, int _value)
      constructor of block object, initialises the value and the location and generates its corresponding image Also initializes colour of each block randomly from the color list
      Destroy_Blocks(Point loc)
      constructor of destry_block object, initialises location and generates its corresponding image image consists of a red circle(body) with a white rectangle(top) over it
      Food(Point loc, int val)
      constructor of food object, initializes the value and the location and generates its corresponding image and text Also sets color of food image(circle) to yellow
      Magnet(Point loc)
      constructor of magnet object, initializes the location and generates its corresponding image Also initializes color of each part of image
      Shield(Point loc)
      constructor of shield object, initializes the location and generates its corresponding image Also sets color of image
      Snake(Point _head, int _length)
      constructor of snake object, intializes the head of the snake and the length and generates the rest of the body as per its length text and images are also initialized here and color is assigned to image and text
      Wall(Point loc, int _length)
      constructor of wall object, initializes the location and its length and generates its corresponding image Also sets color of image
